item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.

An in-depth cradle-to-grave or cradle-to-gate LCA can provide you with a detailed environmental impact assessment of your product or service across a wide array of impact categories. This includes the following reporting characteristics: A detailed process flow diagram and system construction via matrix algebra where high quality regionally relevant input data is procured across the most important processes in the value chain; hotspot analysis identifying key areas of your operation that generate environmental impacts; A sensitivity and/or uncertainty analysis providing an understanding of the influence of variability on your results; A scenario analysis illustrating how impacts change under several possible product/service value chain alternatives; An assessment of next step options to prioritise and reduce your environmental footprint honing in on the most relevant impact categories.
